Welcome to the Web APIs with R book club! 

This website is a companion for the book [_Web APIs with R_](https://jonthegeek.github.io/wapir/) by Jon Harmon (in progress, aiming for publishing in 2024).
This companion is available at [r4ds.io/wapir](https://r4ds.io/wapir).

This website is being developed by the [R4DS Online Learning Community](https://rfordatasci.com). Follow along, and [join the community](https://r4ds.io/join) to participate.

This companion follows the [R4DS Online Learning Community Code of Conduct](https://r4ds.io/conduct).

## Navigation

Each chapter title to the left is a link to a slide deck.
The decks do not currently open in a new window by default, so you might want to control-click th link.
